alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 8:56PM MST until December 02 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties above 6,000 ft. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
